con:request.name: ForeignExchangeRatesCalculatorReq
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v22" xmlns:urn="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:ws:paymentutil:v2_0" xmlns:urn1="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:paymentutil:v2_0" xmlns:urn2="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:complex-types:v2_0"> <soapenv:Header> <wsc:AutHeader> <wsc:SourceApplication>EVRYCPS</wsc:SourceApplication> <wsc:DestinationApplication>PIN</wsc:DestinationApplication> <wsc:Function>paymentAuthorizationCreate</wsc:Function> <wsc:Version>1.0</wsc:Version> <wsc:ClientContext> <wsc:userid>32334114456</wsc:userid> <wsc:credentials></wsc:credentials> <wsc:channel>NBA</wsc:channel> <wsc:orgid>4201</wsc:orgid> <wsc:customerid>32334114456</wsc:customerid> <wsc:ip>1.1.1.1</wsc:ip> <wsc:item key="AgreementId" value="32334114456"/> <wsc:item key="PaymentChannel" value="BES"/> <wsc:item key="LogRef" value="21062021_113306-BM User Create Domestic Credit Transfer"/> </wsc:ClientContext> </wsc:AutHeader>
</soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <urn:ForeignExchangeRatesCalculatorRequest> <urn:paymentAmountInput> <urn1:amount> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level--> <urn2:instructedAmount currency="EUR"> <urn2:amount>50</urn2:amount> </urn2:instructedAmount>
</urn1:amount> <!--Optional:-->
<urn1:debtorAccountCurrency>NOK</urn1:debtorAccountCurrency> </urn:paymentAmountInput> </urn:ForeignExchangeRatesCalculatorRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: RegulatoryAmountLimitValidateReq
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v22" xmlns:urn="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:ws:paymentutil:v2_0" xmlns:urn1="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:paymentutil:v2_0" xmlns:urn2="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:complex-types:v2_0"> <soapenv:Header> <wsc:AutHeader> <wsc:SourceApplication>EVRYCPS</wsc:SourceApplication> <wsc:DestinationApplication>PIN</wsc:DestinationApplication> <wsc:Function>paymentAuthorizationCreate</wsc:Function> <wsc:Version>1.0</wsc:Version> <wsc:ClientContext> <wsc:userid>32334114456</wsc:userid> <wsc:credentials></wsc:credentials> <wsc:channel>NBA</wsc:channel> <wsc:orgid>4201</wsc:orgid> <wsc:customerid>32334114456</wsc:customerid> <wsc:ip>1.1.1.1</wsc:ip> <wsc:item key="AgreementId" value="32334114456"/> <wsc:item key="PaymentChannel" value="BES"/> <wsc:item key="LogRef" value="21062021_113306-BM User Create Domestic Credit Transfer"/> </wsc:ClientContext> </wsc:AutHeader> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <urn:RegulatoryAmountLimitValidateRequest> <urn:regulatoryAmountInput> <urn1:amount> <urn2:equivalentAmount> <urn2:amount currency="NOK"> <urn2:amount>100</urn2:amount> </urn2:amount> <urn2:currencyOfTransfer>NOK</urn2:currencyOfTransfer> </urn2:equivalentAmount> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level-->
</urn1:amount> <!--Optional:--> <urn1:debtorAccountCurrency>USD</urn1:debtorAccountCurrency> </urn:regulatoryAmountInput> </urn:RegulatoryAmountLimitValidateRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
